1106729.description:
Located 164 feet away from Central Park, this hostel is located on Manhattan’s Upper West Side, just 5 minutes’ walk from Columbus Circle. WiFi access is provided free of charge to guests.

A desk, a TV and air conditioning are provided in each room at West Side YMCA.  Linens and towels are included as well. All rooms have access to a shared bathroom down the hall.

A 24-hour front desk welcomes guests to West Side YMCA. The property features a 65000 square-feet fitness center that comes with a  sauna, steam room, weight-lifting and cardiovascular equipment  and 2 indoor swimming pools. There are several free weekly group exercise classes for guests as well. These classes are subject to availability.

Lincoln Center is just 984 feet from the hostel, while Carnegie Hall is 2297 feet away. The American Museum of Natural History is 15 minutes’ walk away.

13357057.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Located in New York within a 15-minute walk of Radio City Music Hall and 0.7 miles of Broadway Theatre, 414 Hotel has rooms with free WiFi. Popular points of interest nearby include Macy's, Top of the Rock and Penn Station. The property is 700 yards from the city center and a 9-minute walk from Times Square.

The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. The rooms have a closet.

414 Hotel can conveniently provide information at the reception to help guests to get around the area.

Popular points of interest near the accommodation include Bryant Park, Jacob K. Javits Convention Center and Carnegie Hall. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles from the property.

182266.hotel_name: Holiday Inn Express - Wall Street, an IHG Hotel
182266.description:
Holiday Inn Express - Wall Street, an IHG Hotel is located within 0.7 mi from City Hall, features a gym and rooms with flat-screen cable TVs.

Guest rooms provide free WiFi, desks and safety deposit boxes. They also include ironing facilities and hairdryers.

Holiday Inn Express - Wall Street, an IHG Hotel serves breakfast and has a business center.

Holiday Inn Express - Wall Street, an IHG Hotel is 1640 feet from New York Stock Exchange. The 9/11 Memorial is 0.8 mi from the property.

182507.hotel_name: La Quinta by Wyndham New York City Central Park
182507.description:
This hotel, located in the center of Manhattan's Upper West Side, is 1 block from Central Park. It offers a continental breakfast and free in-room Wi-Fi.

La Quinta Inn & Suites New York City Central Park guest rooms are equipped with flat-screen cable TVs. An in-room coffee maker and ironing facilities are also included.

Central Park La Quinta Inn & Suites provides a free weekday newspaper in the lobby. The tour desk can help guests explore the city, and concierge services are available.

The 72nd Street Subway Station is 1 block from this New York hotel. Metropolitan Opera House is a 10-minute subway ride from the hotel and the American Museum of Natural History is within a 10-minute walk.

183147.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
This Manhattan Hotel is less than 0.6 mi from Rockefeller Center. It features modern décor and flat-screen TVs in rooms as well as an on-site lounge and rooftop garden.

Pod 51 has a multilingual concierge staff ready to help guests plan their visit to New York. Pod 51 provides a list of complimentary, daily activities going on in the town and organizes 3 daily tours for guests during weekdays.

Breakfast is available at the on-site cafe. The on-site lounge, Clinton Hall, serves American cuisine for lunch and dinner and provides a full bar as well.

Rooms at the Pod 51 have MP3 docking stations and free WiFi. Each room is also equipped with a safety deposit box and a hairdryer.

Radio City Music Hall is 0.7 mi from Pod 51. Times Square is 1.1 mi away, and St. Patrick’s Cathedral is 2113 feet from the Pod.

187781.description:
All guests are required to pay an incidental deposit upon check-in. The hotel will release the amount upon check-out if no additional costs have been incurred during the stay. Please note it may take up to 5-10 business days for the banking institution to release the funds, and up to 30 days for international guests.

Please note, the hotel will accept up to 3 packages prior to the guest's arrival free of charge. Any additional packages will be sent back to the sender.

Please note, names on all packages received must match the reservation name or else the package will be declined. The hotel is not responsible for any missing or declined packages.

Guests under the age of 21 can only check in with a parent or official guardian.

Please note, the facility fee includes the following:
- Unlimited WiFi connectivity
- 24-hour access to fitness center
- 24-hour business center
- 24-hour coffee and tea available
- Local and toll-free telephone calls
- In-room bottled water

21985.hotel_name: Courtyard New York Manhattan/Upper East Side
21985.description:
Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In the event of an early departure, the property will charge you the full amount for your stay.

22296.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
W New York Times Square is located in New York City's Times Square. This hotel is a short walk from Broadway theaters of Theater District. It features an on-site restaurant.

A plasma TV, terry cloth bathrobes and Bliss bath amenities are included in every room at W New York - Times Square. The rooms are also equipped with a stocked mini-bar and light snacks. Room service is also available.

On-site dining options include Dos Caminos Mexican restaurant, Izi and Blue Fin sushi and seafood restaurant. The Living Room Bar offers signature cocktails.The Izi is a 26-seat modern izakaya that offers a Japanese izakaya-inspired menu alongside a curated list of boutique Japanese and American whiskeys, sake and Japanese beers.

A variety of other services, including currency exchange and a tour desk are also available at W New York - Times Square. The on-site shop, W The Store, makes high-end fashion and beauty products available to guests.

The Empire State Building is 0.9 mi from W New York - Times Square. The Metropolitan Museum of Art and the Central Park are 2 mi away.

2377260.description:
Please note that the credit card and photo identification presented at check-in must match the name on the reservation. For third party reservations, a credit card authorization form is required. Contact the property directly with the contact details provided in your confirmation.

Please note that the credit card will be pre-authorized at least 7 days prior to the date of arrival.

26976.description:
Please note that guests are charged the full parking fee every time they enter the garage. Extra charges will apply to oversize vehicles. For further details, please contact the property.

For guest who smokes in the room there will be a charge of $500 smoking fee.

Please note breakfast allowance is $45 per person per day and guest is responsible for the overage.

Please note that guests are charged the full parking fee every time they enter the garage. Extra charges will apply to oversize vehicles. Discounted self-parking is available at Icon Garage – 21 Barclay Street

Millennium Downtown New York is a 100% smoke-free environment, For the comfort of our guests, all our guest rooms are equipped with Rest smoke detector sensors. A $500 fee, per incident, will be charged for smoking, vaping, burning candles or incense in your guest room.

Please note breakfast allowance is $45 per person per day and guest is responsible for the overage.

270216.description:
At check-in, a valid passport must be provided. US residents must provide a valid out-of-state ID. Please note: residents of New York City cannot be accommodated at this property.

Hostel can only honor online bookings of 9 guests maximum. If you have 10 or more guests in your booking, please contact the hostel as different policies apply.

Upon check-in photo identification and credit card is required. All special requests are subject to availability upon check-in. Special requests cannot be guaranteed and may incur additional charges.

Maximum Stay Policy: The maximum length of stay is 21 nights per calendar year

Please note:
- Guests 18 years old and older are welcome to stay in any of our rooms without a parent or adult guardian present.
- Guests 13-17 years old require a parent or adult guardian to be with them in order to stay in a shared dormitory.
- Guests under 13 years old require a parent or adult guardian to be with them in order to stay, but they must reserve a private room or pay for all beds in a dormitory so that it is private

Please note: this property cannot accept packages arriving for guests who are not currently checked in.

270767.hotel_name: InterContinental New York Times Square, an IHG Hotel
270767.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
InterContinental New York Times Square is spread across 36 stories and offers accommodations with floor-to-ceiling windows offering views of the Manhattan skyline, Hudson River and Broadway Theater District.

Each room includes flat-screen TV, spacious work station, spa-inspired bathroom with walk-in rain shower, coffeemaker, mini-bar and hairdryer.

The Intercontinental provides a 24-hour gym. Located on the third floor with views of 44th Street, it features treadmills and free weights.

The InterContinental is within 121 feet of a Subway Station and 1056 feet from Times Square. Theaters, shopping destinations and restaurants can be nearby as well.

The Stinger Cocktail Bar & Kitchen welcomes patrons with a lively scene, craft cocktails, and an a la carte menu. The cozy atmosphere and tempting libations create a fabulous spot for pre- or post-event theater, late night gatherings, or a nightcap.

4925569.hotel_name: La Quinta by Wyndham Time Square South
4925569.description:
Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
In response to the coronavirus (COVID-19), additional safety and sanitation measures are in effect at this property.
A damage deposit of USD 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

549419.description:
This Manhattan hotel is located near Herald Square, within 1640 feet of the Empire State Building and Macy’s. The hotel features concierge services and free WiFi.

The Best Western Premier Herald Square includes rooms with a work desk, in-room safe, and an private bathroom.

Guests can enjoy a daily hot breakfast at the Herald Square Best Western Premier. The hotel offers a fitness center, business center, and an on-site cocktail bar. Newspapers are available at the 24-hour front desk.

Times Square and Grand Central Station are within 0.6 mi of the Best Western Herald Square.

56552.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
This modern hotel is 2297 feet from Grand Central Station and 886 feet from the 51st Street subway.

The Lexington New York City, Autograph Collection provides rooms with dark wood furnishings and blackout drapes. Marble bathrooms contain a curved shower curtain and a granite-top work desk includes an ergonomic chair. Each room is also equipped with a flat-screen TV offering HD channels. Smart TV streaming apps like Netflex, Hulu, Crackle, Pandora are provided in every room.

Casual coffee shop such as Starbucks is available on-site.

The New York City Lexington hotel on-site fitness center includes TVs, music and towels. The business center can be accessed at any time and offers updated information on local flights. The property hosts live entertainment during evenings.

The Lexington, Autograph Collection is 1804 feet from St. Patrick’s Cathedral and 2625 feet from the United Nations Headquarters.

56700.hotel_name: Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel
56700.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
Featuring an extensive health center and a ticket service for popular New York shows, Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel is 180 feet from the 7th Avenue subway station.

A window and a large desk with ergonomic chair provide a comfortable work area.

Hudson Market offers a breakfast buffet and Starbucks coffee each morning. Hudson Market Burger opens each evening, serving prime Angus burgers, sodas and milkshakes.

Guests of the Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel have access to personalized dining and workout programs through the on-site fitness center. A computer center with free Wi-Fi is in the lobby and the 24-hour FedEx Office Print & Ship Center provides fax, copy and printing services.

The Sheraton New York Times Square Hotel is 2297 feet from Rockefeller Center and 1476 feet from Times Square.

56880.description:
Greeted by custom artwork, an original fireplace and a 1920’s elevator system in lobby, guests at this century-old hotel in Upper West Side will be 2133 feet from the Central Park.

Rooms and suites at Arthouse Hotel include flat-screen TVs and desks. Some units come with a private balcony as well, and all units feature an in-room safe that can hold a laptop.

Arthouse Hotel offers guests a 24-hour fitness center, 2 restaurants, a bar, a lobby library and balconies on the 14th and 16th floors from where guests can enjoy views of the neighborhood.

Serafina Bar & Restaurant offers Northern Italian cuisine while RedFarm serves Chinese fare. The Arthouse Bar has a setup inspired by speakeasies and Harlem music clubs.

The American Museum of Natural History is 1640 feet from the Arthouse Hotel while Beacon Theater is 531 feet away.

5708046.hotel_name: Courtyard New York Downtown Manhattan/Financial District
5708046.description:
Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
A damage deposit of USD 200 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed on check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

599531.hotel_name: Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/Chelsea
599531.description:
Courtyard by Marriott New York Manhattan/ Chelsea is a 5 minute walk away from the Pennsylvania Amtrak Station. The hotel also provides complimentary WiFi, luggage storage and free access to an on-site fitness center.

A coffee shop and a 24-hour snack store, The Market is located on the lobby floor. The restaurant next door that serves lunch and dinner can be accessed through the lobby area as well.

A Go Board, an interactive screen that helps you find nearby attractions and directions, is set up for guests’ convenience. They can also enjoy the complimentary use of the business center with three computers.

Every room is equipped with a flat-screen cable TV, a refrigerator and air conditioning. The private bathrooms come with complimentary toiletries and a hairdryer.

With 2 subway stations, the Penn Station and the Herald Square Station, within 1640 feet of the property, Courtyard by Marriott Chelsea is well-connected and easily accessible. Macy’s is only 2113 feet away and The High Line is 3169 feet from the property.

599534.hotel_name: Fairfield Inn by Marriott New York Manhattan/Financial District
599534.description:
Fairfield Inn by Marriott New York Manhattan/Financial District is set in the Wall Street - Financial District district in New York, 2461 feet from Trinity Church and 0.7 mi from Ground Zero. Guests can enjoy the on-site bar.

Each room is fitted with a TV with cable channels. Each room comes with a private bathroom fitted with a bath or shower. Fairfield Inn by Marriott New York features free WiFi throughout the property.

You will find a 24-hour front desk at the property. Guests can enjoy a meal at the Captain's Lounge restaurant.

Brooklyn Bridge is 0.8 mi from Fairfield Inn by Marriott New York Manhattan/Financial District, while National September 11 Memorial & Museum is 0.7 mi from the property. LaGuardia Airport is 15 mi away.

606889.hotel_name: Four Points by Sheraton New York Downtown
606889.description:
Ideally located just steps from popular New York City destinations, Four Points by Sheraton New York Downtown is 5 minutes' walk from Wall Street and the New York Stock Exchange. The shops and restaurants at South Street Seaport are also within 5 minutes' walk.

Free WiFi and daily bottled water are provided for guests' convenience. Rooms feature understated decor and a flat-screen cable TV. The bathrooms are equipped with free toiletries and a hairdryer.

The property features a state-of-the-art fitness center.

Trinity Church is 1312 feet from Four Points Financial District, while Ground Zero is 1640 feet away. LaGuardia Airport is 8.7 mi from the property.

7066178.hotel_name: SpringHill Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan Chelsea
7066178.description:
Located conveniently in the Chelsea district of New York, SpringHill Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan Chelsea is located a 7-minute walk from Madison Square Garden, 0.6 miles from Flatiron Building and a 8-minute walk from Penn Station. Featuring a fitness center, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Private parking can be arranged at an extra charge.

At the hotel, rooms have a desk. The rooms come with a safety deposit box and some have city views. All rooms in SpringHill Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan Chelsea are equipped with a flat-screen TV and free toiletries.

Guests at the accommodation can enjoy a continental breakfast.

Non-stop assistance is available at the reception, where staff speak English and Spanish.

Popular points of interest near SpringHill Suites by Marriott New York Manhattan Chelsea include Macy's, Empire State Building and Bryant Park. LaGuardia Airport is 7.5 miles from the property.

7577618.description:
Stay in the heart of New York.
In a prime location in New York, Hard Rock Hotel New York provides air-conditioned rooms, a fitness center, free WiFi and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the hotel is close to several noted attractions, around a 4-minute walk from Radio City Music Hall, 700 yards from Rockefeller Center and a 9-minute walk from Museum of Modern Art. The property has room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

At the hotel all rooms come with a flat-screen TV and a safety deposit box.

An à la carte, continental or American breakfast is available every morning at the property.

Popular points of interest near Hard Rock Hotel New York include Top of the Rock, Broadway Theatre and St Patrick's Cathedral. LaGuardia Airport is 6.8 miles away.

8229306.description:
Guests are required to show a photo ID and credit card upon check-in. Please note that all Special Requests are subject to availability and additional charges may apply.
A damage deposit of USD 700 is required on arrival. This will be collected by credit card. You should be reimbursed within 14 days of check-out. Your deposit will be refunded in full via credit card, subject to an inspection of the property.

9747758.description:
Located a 19-minute walk from Columbia University, Renaissance New York Harlem Hotel offers 3-star accommodations in New York and features a terrace, a restaurant and a bar. Located around 2.5 miles from Yankee Stadium, the hotel with free WiFi is also 2.8 miles away from Metropolitan Museum of Art. The property provides room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests.

Strawberry Fields is 2.8 miles from the hotel, while Lincoln Center is 4.7 miles away. LaGuardia Airport is 6.2 miles from the property.
